property.name: -VL
property.choices: RAID0 RAID1 RAID5 RAID6 RAID00 RAID10 RAID50 RAID60

property.name: -AM
property.help: acceleration_method,use for PMC, 1 for None, 2 for Controller Cache

property.name: -R
property.choices: Administrator Operator User None CustomRole1 CustomRole2 CustomRole3 CustomRole4 CustomRole5

property.name: -T
property.choices: Web KVM CD-Media FD-Media HD-Media SSH Telnet IPMI SNMP VNC Remote_XDP

mapper.help: locate the physical disk by LED lights.
set IPv4 information of the BMC network port.

property.name: -G
property.help: gateway IPv4 address of the BMC network port

property.name: -M
property.help: subnet mask of the BMC network port

property.name: -T
property.help: how the IPv4 address of the BMC network port is allocated

property.name: -IP
property.help: IPv4 address of the iBMC network port

mapper.help: set IPv6 information of the BMC network port.

property.name: -G
property.help: gateway IPv6 address of the BMC network port

property.name: -L
property.help: IPv6 address prefix length of the iBMC network port

property.name: -T
property.help: how the IPv6 address of the BMC network port is allocated

property.name: -IP
property.help: IPv6 address of the iBMC network port

property.name: -BD
property.help: LDAP administrator user DN, Max length 255.

property.name: -E
property.help: LDAP authentication enabled.(0 for disable 1 for enable)

property.name: -ET
property.help: Encryption type.(0 for no encryption 1 for SSL authentication type)

property.name: -SA
property.help: LDAP Server string (supports IPV4, IPV6, and domain addresses).

property.name: -P
property.help: role privileges, choose a combination from [Kvm, Vmm, SecurityMgmt, ConfigureComponents, PowerControl, Diagnosis, ConfigureSelf]

property.name: -T
property.choices: Web KVM CD-Media FD-Media HD-Media SSH Telnet IPMI SNMP VNC Remote_XDP

property.name: -S
property.help: enable or disable, enabled by default

mapper.help: time zone. for example, UTC+9 and UTC-3.
